001package gbw.melange.common.mesh.formatting.providers;
002
003/**
004 * Any function that takes in 2 params and returns some instance of type R
005 * <pre>
006 *     {@code (t, s, k) -> new R(t, s, k)  ||  R::new, where any 1 constructor in R has args (T, S, K)  }
007 * </pre>
008 * @param <T> in
009 * @param <K> in
010 * @param <S> in
011 * @param <R> out
012 */
013@FunctionalInterface
014public interface TriArgProvider<T,S,K,R>{
015    R create(T t, S s, K k);
016}
